title: Quarterstaves
content: e Enchantment: You gain a +1 bonus to Spell Save DC and spell attack rolls. Caitiff's Restoration: Replenish 1 expended Warlock spell slots. Topple Creation's Echo 1d8 (1d6) Bludgeoning Elemental Resonance: If the wielder deals Acid, Fire, Lightning, Radiant or Necrotic damage, it becomes resistant to that damage type for 2 turns. Topple Despair of Athkatla 1d8 (1d6) +2 Bludgeoning Weapon Enchantment +2 Arcane Enchantment: You gain a +1 bonus to Spell Save DC and spell attack rolls. Topple Gold
